question: Which ministry launched the Talent Hunt for artists and give them a platform to showcase their talent on the national stage?
option1: Minister of Environment and climate change
option3: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
explanation: Minister of culture and tourism Mahesh Sharma launched the National Mission on Cultural Mapping of India in the city. Under the mission, the government will hold a "talent hunt" for artists of various genres and give them a platform to showcase their talent on the national stage. The artists can register themselves on the cultural mapping portal, after which they will be given a unique ID.
